extendedInfo.description: Cover2Mute is an Android application with which you can mute an incoming call by simply sweeping your hand over the phone without touching the screen*The application works properly from version 1.5 to 4.1 but the proximity sensor response is not the same in all versions and is a little slower in version 2.3IMPORTANT: If you have installed a task killer, remember Cover2Mute add to the list of ignored*Make sure your mobile phone has proximity sensor

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: If the mobile in my pocket , It just has no sound we I get a call
reviews.author: Ahmed Elhadad
